content: The Snake Sheriff fights like all other enemies of its type. Watch out for the beast slashing you with its long claws, pouncing on you, and sweeping you off your feet with its long, snake-like neck. These enemies are fast and ferocious, so don't be afraid to cast Immobilize if you need a breather.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snake_Sheriff_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Snake Sheriff Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Sheriff Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Snake Sheriff fights like all other enemies of its type. Watch out for the beast slashing you with its long claws, pouncing on you, and sweeping you off your feet with its long, snake-like neck. These enemies are fast and ferocious, so don't be afraid to cast Immobilize if you need a breather.
